samples.name: Barcode Scanner Button
samples.description: A button control (displaying a barcode icon) to start the barcode scanning process.

samples.name: Barcode Scanner Button with preferFrontCamera, frameRate and zoom
samples.description: The 'preferFrontCamera' defines the front camera to be used or not; the 'frameRate' and 'zoom' can improve the success rate of scanning.

samples.name: Barcode Scanner Button with keepCameraScan, getScanAPIInfo(), setPhysicalScan() and Bluetooth Barcode Scanner
samples.description: The Barcode Scanner control is used in the Enterprise Browser on a Zebra device or disable/enable Bluetooth Barcode Scanner.
